comment: Since most Americans are out-of-shape, weak, and can't fight. Fighting weight is now determined by caliber size. Gun sissies and their stupid advocacy groups. Posturing with a huge gun shows all your weakness in all other aspects of manliness.

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (c / cause-01

                  :op1 (o / out-06

                              :mod (c2 / country
                                    :name (n / name
                                          :op1 "America"))
                              :mod (m2 / most))
                        :ARG2 (s / shape))
                  :op2 (w / weak-02
                        :ARG1 p)
                  :op3 (p2 / possible-01
                        :polarity -
                        :ARG1 (f / fight-01
                              :ARG0 p))))
      :snt2 (d / determine-01
            :ARG1 (w2 / weight
                  :purpose (f2 / fight-01))
            :ARG2 (s2 / size
                  :mod (c3 / caliber))
            :time (n2 / now))
      :snt3 (a2 / and
            :op1 (s3 / sissie
                  :mod (g / gun))
            :op2 (g2 / group
                  :ARG0-of (a3 / advocate-01)
                  :mod (s4 / stupid)
                  :poss s3))
      :snt4 (s5 / show-01
            :ARG0 (p3 / pose-02
                  :instrument (g3 / gun
                        :mod (h / huge)))
            :ARG1 w
            :ARG1 (y / you)
            :ARG2 (a4 / aspect
                  :mod (o2 / other)
                  :mod (a5 / all)
                  :mod a5)
            :topic (m3 / manliness)))
